edge: Raftaar works for Kirpal in Goa after being given an ultimatum by his father.
Sara's father, Mr Rana, works for the mafia and is shot by Mark after rejecting his proposal to marry Sara.
Raftaar hires Emily as a translator for communicating with Sara who doesn't understand Hindi.
Sara meets Kirpal in India and feels safe but presumes Raftaar to be a bad guy.
Raftaar's friends and Sara are kidnapped by the same goons that he tried to save earlier but gets badly beaten.
Sara's opinion changes about Raftaar when she sees him helping a woman who was bothered by the goons.
Emily is shocked to see that Sara can fight, but Sara warns Emily not to reveal about the incident to Raftaar.
